meanings.definition: A small piece or fragment of something
meanings.sent1: She found a gobbet of paper on the floor.
meanings.sent2: He picked up a gobbet of clay to mold into a shape.
meanings.sent3: The gobbet of cheese was so tiny, it made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His heart shattered into a gobbet of sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The gobbet of glass sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A lump or chunk of flesh, especially meat
meanings.sent1: The chef sliced a gobbet of steak for the dish.
meanings.sent2: She grilled a gobbet of chicken for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat eagerly pounced on the gobbet of fish.
meanings.sent4: His muscles felt like a heavy gobbet after the workout.
meanings.sent5: The gobbet of roast beef smelled delicious in the oven.

meanings.definition: A brief extract or passage from a text
meanings.sent1: The student analyzed a gobbet of the poem for class.
meanings.sent2: She highlighted a gobbet of important information in the article.
meanings.sent3: The gobbet of dialogue in the play made the audience chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His mind held onto the gobbet of wisdom from the book.
meanings.sent5: The gobbet of lyrics stuck in her head all day.
